Articles.Content:
So I have been thinking for several days at this point about the difficulty of making good automobile bodies in KSP. I can make chassis all right, and get cars to behave decently, but when it comes to making good car bodies, there is enormous difficulty.

Are there any mods out there that, for instance, resize wing parts to make smaller rectangles and squares? Or, even better, ones that have smaller versions of the radiator panel edge?

And if there aren't good ones, how would one go about resizing the parts from the game files? Or would that require special tools?

There is this mod

or you could edit the cfg's where you see 

	scale = 1    <------------  some have this line leave it
	rescaleFactor = 0.5       <--------  This one you can see they scaled down the part already. You can make them bigger or smaller

I see, I see.

Here's another example: That radiator edge panel I mentioned is a long rectangle. Is there any way to cut that into a square or triangle? Perhaps by tweaking x and y values?

There is one more you might run into 

	MODEL
	{
		model = Squad/Parts/Utility/RelayAntennas/RA-50
	}

change it to 

	MODEL
	{
		model = Squad/Parts/Utility/RelayAntennas/RA-50
scale = 1,1,1
	}
scale = 1
rescaleFactor = 1  <----- to what you want
